subject: Re: Running my junit tests using ant
msgSnippet: The O Reilly book, Java Extreme Programming Cookbook has a chapter on JUnit and Ant along with several good examples. Good luck, Michael boothana
messageBody:
The O'Reilly book, "Java Extreme Programming Cookbook" has a chapter on
JUnit and Ant along with several good examples.

Good luck,

Michael
"boothana" <boothana@...> wrote in message
news:bjk72f+oc8j@......
> Could some body please point me to a tutorial or some documentation
> where i can find information on how to run my tests using ant.
